name: GENERAL MOTORS CORPORATION, c/o CT Corporation and Faulkner Olds, Inc., Petitioners, v. Ashley D'AMICO, a minor by her parents and natural guardians, Christopher D'AMICO, Respondents

parties: GENERAL MOTORS CORPORATION, c/o CT Corporation and Faulkner Olds, Inc., Petitioners, v. Ashley D’AMICO, a minor by her parents and natural guardians, Christopher D’AMICO, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of February, 2008, as the matter filed at Docket Number 0334 March Term, 2005 in the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is discontinued, the Petition for Review is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
941 A.2d 1259
GENERAL MOTORS CORPORATION, c/o CT Corporation and Faulkner Olds, Inc., Petitioners, v. Ashley D’AMICO, a minor by her parents and natural guardians, Christopher D’AMICO, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 5, 2008.
